_xResult.title: Harem Pants
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom Made Pants in Sustainable Jersey Fabric
_xResult.longdesc:
Our "SUPER-SOFT HAREM PANTS" are soft, stretchy and super-smooth against the skin. These pants are designed for women and constructed with the most incredibly fabric you've ever felt. These pants are made with Modal, which is a natural fibre from beech trees.  

Modal is a naturally breathable and absorbent fiber that keeps sweat and moisture from being trapped against your skin. Modal fibers are also lightweight and durable, and resist pilling. Our fabric also contains polyester, which is strong, flexible, and resists wrinkling and shrinking.

Look beautiful and feel beautiful in this classic, timeless design. Made with love and care.

  • Luxuriously soft fabric
  • Loose leg that tapers into lower calf
  • Cut on the bias; beautiful drape
  • Perfect for on the go, an exercise class, or being comfy at home
  • Designed with a high waist band
  • Flattering above the ankle length
  • 3X stretch

 

Fabric: Modal-Polyester Jersey—Smoother than linen, silkier than cotton, a seasonless jersey with incredible drape and stretch.

Content: 65% Modal, 35% Polyester

Care: Machine cold wash, tumble dry low or hang to dry. Do not bleach. Steam iron with protective cloth

Colors (in order from left to right on last photo): Navy, Grape

Model wears color Navy.

properties.propvalue: machine cold wash, tumble dry low or hang to dry, do not bleach, steam iron with protective cloth
